entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
